item.title: Public Preview: Network Observability add-on on AKS
item.description: Enable network observability add-on on AKS clusters to gain insights into how your cluster operate and to identify potential problems before they cause outages or performance degradation.
item.atom:content: Enable network observability add-on on AKS clusters to gain insights into how your cluster operate and to identify potential problems before they cause outages or performance degradation.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Sphere version 23.05
item.description: The Azure Sphere version 23.05 release includes various new features and developer resources.
item.atom:content: The Azure Sphere version 23.05 release includes various new features and developer resources.

item.title: General availability: Introducing DropMappedField transformation for data mappings in Azure Data Explorer
item.description: Azure Data Explorer has added a new capability called "DropMappedField" to its data mappings. This feature allows users to map an object in a JSON document to a column while removing any nested fields that are already referenced by other column mappings.
item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer has added a new capability called "DropMappedField" to its data mappings. This feature allows users to map an object in a JSON document to a column while removing any nested fields that are already referenced by other column mappings.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage in Southeast Asia, UK South, South Central US and West US 3
item.description: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage is now available in more regions and offers the most advanced general-purpose block storage solution with the best price performance.
item.atom:content: Azure Premium SSD v2 Disk Storage is now available in more regions and offers the most advanced general-purpose block storage solution with the best price performance.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Cosmos DB to Azure Data Explorer Synapse Link
item.description: Now generally available: managed ingestion from Azure Cosmos DB to Azure Data Explorer in near real time.
item.atom:content: Now generally available: managed ingestion from Azure Cosmos DB to Azure Data Explorer in near real time.

item.title: Retirement notice: Move to Azure Load Testing GA API versions by 10 September 2023
item.description: Retirement notice: Move to Azure Load Testing GA API versions by 10 September 2023
item.atom:content: Retirement notice: Move to Azure Load Testing GA API versions by 10 September 2023

item.title: Public Preview: IT Service Management Connector (ITSMC) is now certified with ServiceNow Utah version
item.description: The ITSM connector provides a bi-directional connection between Azure and ITSM tools to help track and resolve issues faster.
item.atom:content: The ITSM connector provides a bi-directional connection between Azure and ITSM tools to help track and resolve issues faster.

item.title: General availability: Azure Queue Storage SDK for Go
item.description: The new Azure Queue Storage SDK is now generally available for Go, allowing developers to build Go apps that can store and retrieve messages in Azure Queue Storage.
item.atom:content: The new Azure Queue Storage SDK is now generally available for Go, allowing developers to build Go apps that can store and retrieve messages in Azure Queue Storage.

item.title: General availability: Azure Blob Storage SDK for Go
item.description: The new Azure Blob Storage SDK is now generally available for Go, allowing developers to build Go apps that interact with objects in Azure Blob Storage.
item.atom:content: The new Azure Blob Storage SDK is now generally available for Go, allowing developers to build Go apps that interact with objects in Azure Blob Storage.

item.title: General availability: Azure Event Hubs SDK for Go
item.description: The new Azure Event Hubs SDK is now generally available for Go, allowing developers to build Go apps that send and receive events from Azure Event Hubs.
item.atom:content: The new Azure Event Hubs SDK is now generally available for Go, allowing developers to build Go apps that send and receive events from Azure Event Hubs.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure NetApp Files Availability zone volume placement enhancement – Populate existing volume
item.description: Populate previously deployed, existing volumes with the logical availability zone information to enable failure domain protection for workloads in specific availability zones.
item.atom:content: Populate previously deployed, existing volumes with the logical availability zone information to enable failure domain protection for workloads in specific availability zones.

item.title: General availability: Azure HX Virtual Machines for HPC
item.description: HX-series VMs for HPC are now generally available in the Azure East US region.
item.atom:content: HX-series VMs for HPC are now generally available in the Azure East US region.

item.title: General availability: Azure HBv4 Virtual Machines for HPC
item.description: HBv4-series VMs for HPC are now generally available in the Azure East US region.
item.atom:content: HBv4-series VMs for HPC are now generally available in the Azure East US region.

item.title: Azure VMware Solution now available in North Switzerland
item.description: We are excited to announce that Azure VMware Solution has gone live in North Switzerland and is now available to customers.
item.atom:content: We are excited to announce that Azure VMware Solution has gone live in North Switzerland and is now available to customers.

item.title: Public preview: Assess impact of service retirements using new workbook template in Azure Advisor
item.description: Review upcoming service and feature retirements and their impact on your workloads using the new Service Retirement workbook template which is available in Azure Advisor.
item.atom:content: Review upcoming service and feature retirements and their impact on your workloads using the new Service Retirement workbook template which is available in Azure Advisor.

item.title: Public Preview: GraphQL resolvers for Azure Cosmos DB, Azure SQL in Azure API Management

item.atom:content: We are thrilled to announce the public preview of Azure Cosmos DB and Azure SQL resolvers for GraphQL in Azure API Management.

item.atom:content: Public preview of Azure Virtual Desktop Insights Powered by Azure Monitor Agent feature in Azure Virtual Desktop

item.atom:content: Improve the performance of your database with query performance insight for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server.

item.atom:content: Migrate your MySQL instances using Azure Database Migration Service with minimal downtime to Azure Database for MySQL – Flexible Server.

item.atom:content: Connect to, query, and develop for MySQL hosted on-premises or in the cloud with the MySQL extension for Azure Data Studio.

item.title: Public preview: Confidential Virtual Machines (VM) support in Azure Virtual Desktop

item.atom:content: Users can now specify an AMD SEV-SNP based confidential VM for their Windows 11 Azure Virtual Desktop, allowing the execution of sensitive desktop workloads by protecting data in use.

item.atom:content: Save time by analyzing and troubleshooting common performance issues with troubleshooting guides for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server.

item.atom:content: More accurate information about specific add-ons and node images

item.atom:content: Scale your cache instances to up to 30 shards with Azure Cache for Redis.

item.title: Azure HDInsight for Apache Spark 3.3 is now available for public preview
item.description: Apache Spark™ 3.3 on HDInsight is now in preview.
item.atom:content: Apache Spark™ 3.3 on HDInsight is now in preview.

item.title: Enhanced autoscale capabilities added to HDInsight clusters
item.description: Azure HDInsight has made notable improvements in stability and latency on Autoscale.
item.atom:content: Azure HDInsight has made notable improvements in stability and latency on Autoscale.

item.title: General availability: Poland Central region added to Azure HDInsight
item.description: HDInsight is now generally available in Poland Central.
item.atom:content: HDInsight is now generally available in Poland Central.

item.title: Microsoft Azure Load Testing - additional Azure components for server-side monitoring
item.description: Azure Load Testing load testing now supports additional Azure components for server-side monitoring during a load test run.
item.atom:content: Azure Load Testing load testing now supports additional Azure components for server-side monitoring during a load test run.

item.title: Generally available: Pgvector extension on Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL
item.description: Native vector data type enables easy storage of AI generated embeddings performing Euclidean and inner product and cosine distance searches--directly within the database.
item.atom:content: Native vector data type enables easy storage of AI generated embeddings performing Euclidean and inner product and cosine distance searches--directly within the database.

item.title: Microsoft Azure Load Testing - configure auto stop criteria
item.description: Configure auto stop criteria automatically stops a load test if the error percentage exceeds a given threshold for a certain time window.
item.atom:content: Configure auto stop criteria automatically stops a load test if the error percentage exceeds a given threshold for a certain time window.

item.title: Azure HDinsight Spark 2.4 approaching EOL
item.description: Azure HDInsight for Apache Spark 2.4 will be retired as of February 10, 2024.
item.atom:content: Azure HDInsight for Apache Spark 2.4 will be retired as of February 10, 2024.

item.title: Generally Available: Managed identity authentication in Azure Monitor container insights
item.description: Managed Identity is a secure & simplified authentication model where our agent uses the cluster’s managed identity to send data to Azure Monitor.
item.atom:content: Managed Identity is a secure & simplified authentication model where our agent uses the cluster’s managed identity to send data to Azure Monitor.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Cache for Redis trigger for Azure Functions
item.description: Trigger serverless functions through Azure Cache for Redis.
item.atom:content: Trigger serverless functions through Azure Cache for Redis.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Data Explorer bindings for Azure Functions

item.atom:content: You can now interact with Azure Data Explorer in a low-code declarative fashion.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Cosmos DB Vercel integration

item.atom:content: Build your apps now using Vercel to easily connect an existing Azure Cosmos DB database to your Vercel projects.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure VMware Solution Stretched Clusters with Customer-Managed Keys

item.atom:content: Stretched clusters for Azure VMware Solution (AVS) is now Generally Available, providing 99.99% uptime for mission critical applications that require the highest availability.

item.description: Provision up to 10 read replicas in geo-paired regions on Azure Database for MySQL— Flexible Server.
item.atom:content: Provision up to 10 read replicas in geo-paired regions on Azure Database for MySQL— Flexible Server.

item.atom:content: Use the application map for a more complete view of end-to-end transactions to better diagnose issues and interactions

item.atom:content: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-June 2023

item.atom:content: Zone Redundant Storage (ZRS) for Azure Disks is now available on Azure Premium SSD and Standard SSD in Japan East and Korea Central.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Monitor Alert resources now visible in the Azure portal

item.atom:content: Alert rules, alert processing rules and action groups can now be viewed in the portal alongside all Azure resources.

item.title: Microsoft Azure Load Testing supports setting up quick start tests using requests per second
item.description: You can now set up a 'quick test' to check that your endpoint can handle a certain throughput of requests per second (RPS).
item.atom:content: You can now set up a 'quick test' to check that your endpoint can handle a certain throughput of requests per second (RPS).

item.title: Public Preview: Redis extension for Azure Functions

item.atom:content: You can now leverage Redis data types as triggers for serverless app development.

item.title: New Instance Types for Azure Red Hat OpenShift are now available

item.atom:content: You now have more virtual machine sizes to choose from in Azure Red Hat OpenShift.

item.title: General availability: 32 TB storage in Azure Database for PostgreSQL - Flexible Server

item.atom:content: Extend storage up to 32 TB to host databases with a size greater than 16 TB for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server.

item.title: Available: Reduced pricing for Azure Video Indexer

item.atom:content: Azure Video indexer will be adding Advanced Audio and Video SKUs for Advanced presets and a 40% price reduction on the Basic Audio Analysis, Audio Analysis and Video Analysis SKUs.

item.description: New feature now available in Public Preview enables you to view job statuses without unnecessary compute cost accrual.
item.atom:content: New feature now available in Public Preview enables you to view job statuses without unnecessary compute cost accrual.

item.atom:content: New feature now available in Public Preview enables you to perform distributed training on large datasets.

item.title: General availability of Azure Front Door integration with managed identities
item.description: Azure Front Door supports using managed identity to access Key Vault without the need to generate, store, and rotate secrets. This is a secure service to service authentication method to enhance security.
item.atom:content: Azure Front Door supports using managed identity to access Key Vault without the need to generate, store, and rotate secrets. This is a secure service to service authentication method to enhance security.

item.title: Generally available: Azure OpenAI Service in UK South

item.atom:content: Azure OpenAI Service is now available in the UK South region. UK South supports gpt-35-turbo at launch.

item.title: General availability: Azure Sphere version 23.05 is delayed to 20 June, and the updated OS has been issued to Retail Eval

item.atom:content: Participate in the retail evaluation now to ensure full compatibility. The OS evaluation period provides seven days for backward compatibility testing.

item.title: General availability: Azure Front Door Migration from classic to standard/premium
item.description: Azure Front Door Standard/Premium is the new Azure native, modern cloud content delivery network (CDN) catering to both dynamic and static content delivery acceleration with enhanced security and a simple and predictable pricing model.
item.atom:content: Azure Front Door Standard/Premium is the new Azure native, modern cloud content delivery network (CDN) catering to both dynamic and static content delivery acceleration with enhanced security and a simple and predictable pricing model.

item.atom:content: Upgrade from standard to premium for enhanced Web Application Firewall rules and private connectivity to your origins using Private Link.

item.title: General availability: Inbound ICMPv6 pings and traceroute are now supported on Azure Load Balancer
item.description: Ping and traceroute to both IPv4 and IPv6 frontend of a Standard Public Load Balancer like you natively would on an on-premises device without any external software needed.
item.atom:content: Ping and traceroute to both IPv4 and IPv6 frontend of a Standard Public Load Balancer like you natively would on an on-premises device without any external software needed.

item.atom:content: Azure Front Door Standard/Premium is the new Azure native, modern cloud content delivery network (CDN) catering to both dynamic and static content delivery acceleration with enhanced security and a simple and predictable pricing model.

item.atom:content: We’re pleased to announce that version 1.1.0 of the Azure Container Registry (ACR) libraries for .NET, Java, JavaScript/TypeScript, and Python are now generally available.

item.atom:content: You can now take advantage of unused Azure computing with Azure Container Instances (ACI)

item.title: Public Preview: Azure AD Support for Azure Files SMB shares REST API

item.atom:content: With this announcement, cloud native and modern applications that use REST APIs to access Azure SMB shares can utilize identity-based authentication and authorization to access file shares.

item.atom:content: Application Gateway Private Link allows you to connect your workloads over a private connection spanning across VNets and subscriptions

item.title: Generally available: Multiple backups per day for Azure Virtual Machines

item.atom:content: Protect Azure Virtual Machines with Recovery Point Objective (RPO) as low as four hours.

item.title: General availability: New KQL function to enrich your data analysis with geographic context

item.atom:content: KQL introduces a new function to retrieve country, state, city, and coordinates from IP addresses using GeoLite2 data. Find out how to use geo_info_from_ip_address() and what it can do for your data analysis.

item.atom:content: Increase resiliency, higher availability, and flexibility by utilizing more than 2 Standard Load Balancers per VM.

item.title: Azure Support Plan Offer extended to December 31, 2023

item.atom:content: The existing Azure Support offer is being extended. The promotion will run from July 1, 2023 to December 31, 2023.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Files scalability improvement for Azure Virtual Desktop and other workloads that open root directory handles

item.atom:content: Azure Files has increased the root directory handle limit per share from 2,000 to 10,000 for standard and premium file shares.

item.atom:content: Resource-centric log query support is available in the latest stable release of the Azure Monitor Query client libraries. Query logs by Azure resource ID using .NET, Go, Java, JavaScript, or Python.

item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer now supports ingestion of data from .NET Applications via the NLog Sink.

item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer Bindings for Azure Functions (Public Preview)

item.atom:content: Leverage next generation eBPF dataplane for pod networking, Kubernetes network policies and service load balancing.

item.title: Setting Up a CI/CD Pipeline with GitHub Actions for Stream Analytics Jobs
item.description: Are you using GitHub for managing your Stream Analytics project and looking to leverage GitHub's powerful CI/CD pipeline? Follow this comprehensive guide and learn to set up a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions for your Stream Analytics jobs.
item.atom:content: Are you using GitHub for managing your Stream Analytics project and looking to leverage GitHub's powerful CI/CD pipeline? Follow this comprehensive guide and learn to set up a CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions for your Stream Analytics jobs.

item.title: Public Preview – Support for WebSocket APIs in Azure API Management Self-hosted Gateway
item.description: We are announcing the native support for WebSocket APIs in the self-hosted gateway feature inside Azure API Management.
item.atom:content: We are announcing the native support for WebSocket APIs in the self-hosted gateway feature inside Azure API Management.

item.title: Public Preview: Data mapping designer in Azure Logic Apps (Standard)
item.description: Microsoft has re-envisioned data transformations in Azure Logic Apps (Standard) by building a new data mapper experience from the ground up.
item.atom:content: Microsoft has re-envisioned data transformations in Azure Logic Apps (Standard) by building a new data mapper experience from the ground up.

item.title: PublicPreview: Azure API Management: API Center
item.description:
Centrally organize and manage APIs across the entire organization, regardless of API type, deployment location, lifecycle stage, or choice of API gateway or API management solution using Azure API Center.
Boost developer productivity by facilitating API discovery and promoting API reuse. Establish a governance model for API portfolio across the entire organization. Elevate API inventory management by organizing and enriching APIs with custom metadata, API versions, and deployment details. Click here to learn more.
item.atom:content:
Centrally organize and manage APIs across the entire organization, regardless of API type, deployment location, lifecycle stage, or choice of API gateway or API management solution using Azure API Center.
Boost developer productivity by facilitating API discovery and promoting API reuse. Establish a governance model for API portfolio across the entire organization. Elevate API inventory management by organizing and enriching APIs with custom metadata, API versions, and deployment details. Click here to learn more.

item.title: GA: Logic Apps (Standard) adds support for .NET Framework extensibility in XSLT data.
item.description: Developers can now add .NET Framework methods to XSLT data transformations in Azure Logic Apps (Standard).
item.atom:content: Developers can now add .NET Framework methods to XSLT data transformations in Azure Logic Apps (Standard).

item.title: Generally available: Apache MirrorMaker 2 support in Azure Event Hubs
item.description: Users now can utilize MirrorMaker2 for effortless data replication from their on-premises or managed Kafka cluster directly to Event Hubs.
item.atom:content: Users now can utilize MirrorMaker2 for effortless data replication from their on-premises or managed Kafka cluster directly to Event Hubs.

item.title: Public Preview: JSON Schema support in Azure Event Hubs Schema Registry for Kafka applications

item.atom:content: The Azure Event Hubs Schema Registry provides support for JSON Schema

item.title: Generally Available – New Azure Event Grid events for Azure API Management Self-hosted gateway

item.atom:content: We are announcing the support for 11 new Azure Event Grid event types in Azure API Management.

item.title: Generally available: Kafka Connect support in Azure Event Hubs
item.description: With Kafka Connect support GA, users can seamlessly and reliably stream data between Azure Event Hubs and external systems such as databases, key-value stores, file systems and other data sources.
item.atom:content: With Kafka Connect support GA, users can seamlessly and reliably stream data between Azure Event Hubs and external systems such as databases, key-value stores, file systems and other data sources.

item.description: We are announcing the support of custom domain for the self-hosted gateway configuration endpoint v2.
item.atom:content: We are announcing the support of custom domain for the self-hosted gateway configuration endpoint v2.

item.atom:content: New authentication method for the Self-hosted gateway with the configuration endpoint

item.title: Generally available: Managed Identities support for Capture in Event Hubs
item.description: Users now can use managed identities when capturing event streams to storage services such as Azure Storage Services or Azure Data Lake storage 2.
item.atom:content: Users now can use managed identities when capturing event streams to storage services such as Azure Storage Services or Azure Data Lake storage 2.

item.title: Generally available: Kafka compaction support in Azure Event Hubs
item.description: Log compaction in Event Hubs introduces a key-based retention mechanism where the most recent value associated with each event key in an event hub or Kafka topic is retained.
item.atom:content: Log compaction in Event Hubs introduces a key-based retention mechanism where the most recent value associated with each event key in an event hub or Kafka topic is retained.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Files geo-redundancy for standard large file shares
item.description: Azure Files geo-redundancy for large file shares is now in public preview for standard SMB file shares.
item.atom:content: Azure Files geo-redundancy for large file shares is now in public preview for standard SMB file shares.

item.title: Generally Available: Exactly Once Delivery to ADLS Gen2 Output
item.description: Azure Stream Analytics supports for end-to-end exactly once semantics when writing to Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.
item.atom:content: Azure Stream Analytics supports for end-to-end exactly once semantics when writing to Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure AI Content Safety
item.description: Azure AI Content Safety is a new Azure AI service that identifies harmful online content, categorizes it and assigns severity scores to support human content moderator workloads.
item.atom:content: Azure AI Content Safety is a new Azure AI service that identifies harmful online content, categorizes it and assigns severity scores to support human content moderator workloads.

item.title: Private Preview: Kafka Input and Output with Azure Stream Analytics
item.description: You can connect directly to Kafka to ingest from Kafka clusters or output data to Kafka clusters in your Azure Stream Analytics (ASA) job.
item.atom:content: You can connect directly to Kafka to ingest from Kafka clusters or output data to Kafka clusters in your Azure Stream Analytics (ASA) job.

item.title: Virtual Network Integration Support (Public Preview) for Azure Stream Analytics
item.description: ASA is thrilled to announce public preview of Virtual Network Integration support for Azure Stream Analytics!
item.atom:content: ASA is thrilled to announce public preview of Virtual Network Integration support for Azure Stream Analytics!

item.title: Azure Stream Analytics is Launching a New Competitive Pricing Model!
item.description: Up to 80% price reduction in Azure Stream Analytics
item.atom:content: Up to 80% price reduction in Azure Stream Analytics

item.title: Public preview: Soft delete of Recovery Points for Azure Backup
item.description: Azure Backup's soft delete of recovery points allows you to recover any recovery points that may have been accidentally or maliciously deleted owing to operations that could lead to deletion of one or more recovery points.
item.atom:content: Azure Backup's soft delete of recovery points allows you to recover any recovery points that may have been accidentally or maliciously deleted owing to operations that could lead to deletion of one or more recovery points.

item.title: Generally Available: Exactly Once Delivery to Event Hub Output
item.description: Stream Analytics now supports end-to-end exactly once semantics when writing to Event Hub output.
item.atom:content: Stream Analytics now supports end-to-end exactly once semantics when writing to Event Hub output.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Cosmos DB SDKs OpenTelemetry and Application Insights integration
item.description: Monitoring your applications is easier than ever with new support for OpenTelemetry and improved Application Insights integration.
item.atom:content: Monitoring your applications is easier than ever with new support for OpenTelemetry and improved Application Insights integration.

item.title: Optimize your reservation purchases with reservation utilization alerts.
item.description: Activate reservation utilization alerts and take control of your Azure reservation strategy.
item.atom:content: Activate reservation utilization alerts and take control of your Azure reservation strategy.

item.title: Optimize your reservation purchases with reservation utilization alerts.
item.description: Activate reservation utilization alerts and take control of your Azure reservation strategy.
item.atom:content: Activate reservation utilization alerts and take control of your Azure reservation strategy.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus
item.description: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus is now Generally Available.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus is now Generally Available.

item.title: Public Preview: Dynamic Blob container name
item.description: Azure Stream Analytics offers dynamic blob container name to give customers the flexibility to customize container names in Blob storage output.
item.atom:content: Azure Stream Analytics offers dynamic blob container name to give customers the flexibility to customize container names in Blob storage output.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Stream Analytics Schema Registry Integration
item.description: Azure Stream Analytics can now fetch schema from the Schema Registry and deserialize data from Event Hub inputs for Avro format.
item.atom:content: Azure Stream Analytics can now fetch schema from the Schema Registry and deserialize data from Event Hub inputs for Avro format.

item.title: Public Preview: App Service automatic scaling support in portal UX
item.description: Now you can use the Azure Portal to configure App Service auto-scaling rules.
item.atom:content: Now you can use the Azure Portal to configure App Service auto-scaling rules.

item.title: Optimize your reservation purchases with reservation utilization alerts.
item.description: Activate reservation utilization alerts and take control of your Azure reservation strategy.
item.atom:content: Activate reservation utilization alerts and take control of your Azure reservation strategy.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor announces Network Observability AKS add-on
item.description: The new Network Observability AKS add-on provides complete observability into the network health and connectivity of your AKS cluster.
item.atom:content: The new Network Observability AKS add-on provides complete observability into the network health and connectivity of your AKS cluster.

item.title: Preview: Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 9.2 support for AMD confidential VMs
item.description: User of AMD-based confidential VMs can now select the RHEL 9.2 technical preview as their guest OS.
item.atom:content: User of AMD-based confidential VMs can now select the RHEL 9.2 technical preview as their guest OS.

item.title: AMD Confidential VM option for Azure Databricks
item.description: Users can now select AMD-based confidential VMs for their Azure Databricks cluster driver node and cluster worker nodes.
item.atom:content: Users can now select AMD-based confidential VMs for their Azure Databricks cluster driver node and cluster worker nodes.

item.title: Public Preview: AMD confidential VM option for Azure Data Explorer (ADX)
item.description: Users can now run their most sensitive data workloads in ADX clusters on AMD-based confidential VM SKUs.
item.atom:content: Users can now run their most sensitive data workloads in ADX clusters on AMD-based confidential VM SKUs.

item.title: Build 2023: New Azure App Service plans fuel greater choice and savings
item.description: New plans for Microsoft Azure App Service customers with two new offerings in the Premium v3 (Pv3) service tier, and expansion in the Isolated v2 tier.
item.atom:content: New plans for Microsoft Azure App Service customers with two new offerings in the Premium v3 (Pv3) service tier, and expansion in the Isolated v2 tier.

item.title: Generally Available: V2 programming model for Azure Functions using Python
item.description: A simplified programming model for Python developers.
item.atom:content: A simplified programming model for Python developers.

item.title: Azure Key Vault Access Configuration Update
item.description: Azure RBAC is now the recommended authorization system for the Azure Key Vault data plane.
item.atom:content: Azure RBAC is now the recommended authorization system for the Azure Key Vault data plane.

item.title: Database Migration Assessment for Oracle - GA
item.description: Database Migration Assessment for Oracle extension analyzes an organization's Oracle database, identifying performance requirements and code compatibility with the target Azure database for a smooth migration.
item.atom:content: Database Migration Assessment for Oracle extension analyzes an organization's Oracle database, identifying performance requirements and code compatibility with the target Azure database for a smooth migration.

item.title: Public Preview: Time-travel for Azure Synapse Link for Cosmos DB
item.description: Rewind to read previous transactions in Synapse Link containers to analyze previous versions of your document with time-travel for Azure Synapse Link
item.atom:content: Rewind to read previous transactions in Synapse Link containers to analyze previous versions of your document with time-travel for Azure Synapse Link

item.title: Available: Azure Database for MySQL connector for Power Platform and Azure Logic Apps
item.description: Azure Database for MySQL connector for Power Platform, Azure Logic Apps is now available and allows you to connect to any MySQL Flexible Server database to read and write data.
item.atom:content: Azure Database for MySQL connector for Power Platform, Azure Logic Apps is now available and allows you to connect to any MySQL Flexible Server database to read and write data.

item.title: General availability: Confidential containers on Azure Container Instances (ACI)
item.description: ACI now lets you run containers in a trusted execution environment (TEE)
item.atom:content: ACI now lets you run containers in a trusted execution environment (TEE)

item.title: Generally Available: Cost-optimizations with transformations on Log Analytics for troubleshooting Cosmos DB
item.description: Optimize costs on your Log Analytics workspace by adding transformation rules to your Cosmos DB LA tables.
item.atom:content: Optimize costs on your Log Analytics workspace by adding transformation rules to your Cosmos DB LA tables.

item.title: Azure SQL Managed Instance —Public preview updates for late-May 2023
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late-May 2023
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in late-May 2023

item.title: Database Migration Service Pack for Oracle - Preview
item.description: An Azure Data Studio extension pack for end-to-end Oracle database schema and data migration to Azure Data (SQL and PostgreSQL)
item.atom:content: An Azure Data Studio extension pack for end-to-end Oracle database schema and data migration to Azure Data (SQL and PostgreSQL)

item.title: Microsoft Azure Deployment Environments is now generally available.
item.description: Azure Deployment Environments is now generally available. With Deployment Environments, developers can self-deploy the environments they need on demand using infrastructure-as-code templates.
item.atom:content: Azure Deployment Environments is now generally available. With Deployment Environments, developers can self-deploy the environments they need on demand using infrastructure-as-code templates.

item.title: Public preview: Automated deployments in AKS now supports Draft
item.description: Configure automated deployments to create a Dockerfile, build a container image and create Kubernetes deployment files directly from your source code.
item.atom:content: Configure automated deployments to create a Dockerfile, build a container image and create Kubernetes deployment files directly from your source code.

item.title: Public Preview: Vector search in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore
item.description: Vector search in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore enhances AI-driven applications using OpenAI API or custom-built solutions by incorporating vector similarity search into your database.
item.atom:content: Vector search in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB vCore enhances AI-driven applications using OpenAI API or custom-built solutions by incorporating vector similarity search into your database.

item.title: General Availability – Database Schema Conversion Toolkit for Oracle
item.description: An extension that automates and provides code conversion from Oracle to SQL to simplify and accelerate the migration process.
item.atom:content: An extension that automates and provides code conversion from Oracle to SQL to simplify and accelerate the migration process.

item.title: Public Preview – Data Migration for Oracle
item.description: Seamless data migration from Oracle to Azure with the new Azure Database Migration Service extension
item.atom:content: Seamless data migration from Oracle to Azure with the new Azure Database Migration Service extension

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Cosmos DB serverless container with 1 TB storage
item.description: Azure Cosmos DB serverless 1-TB is now generally available. Enjoy expanded storage capacity, allowing you to store up to 1 TB of data in a single container.
item.atom:content: Azure Cosmos DB serverless 1-TB is now generally available. Enjoy expanded storage capacity, allowing you to store up to 1 TB of data in a single container.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Cosmos DB hierarchical partition keys
item.description: Now generally available, hierarchical partition keys in Azure Cosmos DB enables you to partition your data with up to three levels of keys.
item.atom:content: Now generally available, hierarchical partition keys in Azure Cosmos DB enables you to partition your data with up to three levels of keys.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Cosmos DB all versions and deletes change feed mode
item.description: The new all versions and deletes mode for change feed allows you to read item creates, updates, and deletes that occurred within the continuous backup period configured on your account.
item.atom:content: The new all versions and deletes mode for change feed allows you to read item creates, updates, and deletes that occurred within the continuous backup period configured on your account.

item.title: Public Preview: Materialized views for Cosmos DB NoSQL API
item.description: Create materialized views on top of your NoSQL containers to reduce cross partition queries, improve speed, and reduce costs.
item.atom:content: Create materialized views on top of your NoSQL containers to reduce cross partition queries, improve speed, and reduce costs.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus for Azure Arc-enabled Kubernetes
item.description: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus is now extending monitoring support for Kubernetes clusters hosted on Azure Arc.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus is now extending monitoring support for Kubernetes clusters hosted on Azure Arc.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor Container insights introduces "Cluster Optimization" workbook
item.description: Customers can now use Azure Monitor Container insights “Cluster Optimization” workbook to optimize container limits and request, identify event anomalies and detect liveness probe failures.
item.atom:content: Customers can now use Azure Monitor Container insights “Cluster Optimization” workbook to optimize container limits and request, identify event anomalies and detect liveness probe failures.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Monitor announces managed services for Prometheus
item.description: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus delivers the best of the open-source ecosystem while automating complex tasks such as scaling, high-availability, and long-term data retention.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor managed service for Prometheus delivers the best of the open-source ecosystem while automating complex tasks such as scaling, high-availability, and long-term data retention.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Log Alerts support for Azure Data Explorer
item.description: Azure Monitor Log Alerts is expanding to support monitoring based on data that stored in Azure Data Explorer (ADX) tables, empowering customers to leverage ADX without compromising their service monitoring.
item.atom:content: Azure Monitor Log Alerts is expanding to support monitoring based on data that stored in Azure Data Explorer (ADX) tables, empowering customers to leverage ADX without compromising their service monitoring.

item.title: Generally Available: Linked backends for Azure Static Web Apps
item.description: You can now link your backend APIs to your Static Web Apps applications for seamless routing and integrated security.
item.atom:content: You can now link your backend APIs to your Static Web Apps applications for seamless routing and integrated security.

item.title: Public preview: Azure Functions for cloud-native microservices
item.description: Quickly build event driven, cloud native apps, with the flexibility to run functions along with other microservices, APIs, websites, workflows or any container hosted programs.
item.atom:content: Quickly build event driven, cloud native apps, with the flexibility to run functions along with other microservices, APIs, websites, workflows or any container hosted programs.

item.title: Generally Available: SQL Bindings for Azure Functions
item.description: With input and output bindings for SQL, you can now can quickly write Azure Functions that read and write from your databases.
item.atom:content: With input and output bindings for SQL, you can now can quickly write Azure Functions that read and write from your databases.

item.title: Public preview: ASP.NET Core integration in Azure Functions .NET isolated model
item.description: Use familiar ASP.NET Core types to construct HTTP-triggered functions in the isolated worker model.
item.atom:content: Use familiar ASP.NET Core types to construct HTTP-triggered functions in the isolated worker model.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Event Grid now includes MQTT protocol support and HTTP pull-style message delivery.
item.description: Publish and subscribe to messages between MQTT clients and use HTTP push and pull subscriptions to integrate data with other applications.
item.atom:content: Publish and subscribe to messages between MQTT clients and use HTTP push and pull subscriptions to integrate data with other applications.

item.title: New capabilities available in Microsoft Dev Box
item.description: Microsoft Dev Box is introducing several new capabilities to enhance developer experience and boost productivity. In addition, Dev Box general availability will begin in July.
item.atom:content: Microsoft Dev Box is introducing several new capabilities to enhance developer experience and boost productivity. In addition, Dev Box general availability will begin in July.

item.title: Public Preview: GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps
item.description: Learn how GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps implements code scanning, secret scanning, and dependency scanning in Azure DevOps.
item.atom:content: Learn how GitHub Advanced Security for Azure DevOps implements code scanning, secret scanning, and dependency scanning in Azure DevOps.

item.title: Public preview: Secrets volume mounts for Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now mount secrets as volumes in Azure Container Apps.
item.atom:content: You can now mount secrets as volumes in Azure Container Apps.

item.title: Public preview: Free managed TLS certificates for Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now use managed certificates with Azure Container Apps
item.atom:content: You can now use managed certificates with Azure Container Apps

item.title: Public preview: Serverlessly run on-demand, scheduled, and event-driven jobs on Azure Container Apps
item.description: Run workloads that perform a task for a finite duration and exit, and schedule these workloads or run them in response to events.
item.atom:content: Run workloads that perform a task for a finite duration and exit, and schedule these workloads or run them in response to events.

item.title: AKS DevX Extension Updates for Visual Studio Code
item.description: Easily create and deploy GitHub Actions to automate your deployments.
item.atom:content: Easily create and deploy GitHub Actions to automate your deployments.

item.title: Public preview: Multi-cluster update support in Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager
item.description: Orchestrate upgrades to your clusters in a planned manner across multiple clusters to achieve a consistent environment across a set of clusters.
item.atom:content: Orchestrate upgrades to your clusters in a planned manner across multiple clusters to achieve a consistent environment across a set of clusters.

item.title: Public preview: Custom node config for Windows
item.description: You can now modify the node configuration on Windows nodes, as you do with Linux.
item.atom:content: You can now modify the node configuration on Windows nodes, as you do with Linux.

item.title: Generally Available: Kubernetes marketplace
item.description: Access to a vibrant ecosystem of first-party and third-party solutions for building robust enterprise solutions.
item.atom:content: Access to a vibrant ecosystem of first-party and third-party solutions for building robust enterprise solutions.

item.title: Generally Available: Generation 2 VM for Windows
item.description: You can now run Windows workloads on Generation 2 VMs.
item.atom:content: You can now run Windows workloads on Generation 2 VMs.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Linux support in AKS
item.description: Deploy Azure Linux as the node pool host OS in the AKS cluster and build apps on top of the preferred container.
item.atom:content: Deploy Azure Linux as the node pool host OS in the AKS cluster and build apps on top of the preferred container.

item.title: Public preview: New features in Azure Container Storage
item.description: Azure Container Storage, a unique storage provisioning and management service built natively for containers, is introducing several new features in preview.
item.atom:content: Azure Container Storage, a unique storage provisioning and management service built natively for containers, is introducing several new features in preview.

item.title: Public preview: Azure SQL Database Hyperscale elastic pools
item.description: You can now efficiently provision and scale compute resources independent of data size by deploying multiple Azure SQL Hyperscale databases with varying workloads in elastic pools.
item.atom:content: You can now efficiently provision and scale compute resources independent of data size by deploying multiple Azure SQL Hyperscale databases with varying workloads in elastic pools.

item.title: Generally Available: Enhanced document expiration with Time to Live (TTL) on any field.
item.description: Effortlessly set a TTL on any field in a collection, giving you more flexibility to control how your documents expire in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB RU.
item.atom:content: Effortlessly set a TTL on any field in a collection, giving you more flexibility to control how your documents expire in Azure Cosmos DB for MongoDB RU.

item.title: Public Preview: In-Account restore for continuous backup accounts
item.description: Customers can restore the deleted database and containers in the same continuous backup account.
item.atom:content: Customers can restore the deleted database and containers in the same continuous backup account.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Cosmos DB computed properties
item.description: Simplify complex queries using computed properties which can represent frequently used query logic such as expressions based on persisted item properties and can be indexed for increased performance.
item.atom:content: Simplify complex queries using computed properties which can represent frequently used query logic such as expressions based on persisted item properties and can be indexed for increased performance.

item.title: Generally Available: Azure Cosmos DB burst capacity
item.description: Now generally available, Azure Cosmos DB burst capacity helps improve performance by allowing you to use idle throughput to handle temporary spikes in traffic.
item.atom:content: Now generally available, Azure Cosmos DB burst capacity helps improve performance by allowing you to use idle throughput to handle temporary spikes in traffic.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning - Public Preview for Build
item.description: New features now available in PuPr include the ability to evaluate text/image data fairness and enjoy one platform to build, tune, evaluate, deploy, and test AI workflow with LLM.
item.atom:content: New features now available in PuPr include the ability to evaluate text/image data fairness and enjoy one platform to build, tune, evaluate, deploy, and test AI workflow with LLM.

item.title: Azure Machine Learning - General Availability for Build
item.description: New features now available in GA include the ability to enable MLOPs across dev, test, and prod environments to promote assets across multiple workspaces.
item.atom:content: New features now available in GA include the ability to enable MLOPs across dev, test, and prod environments to promote assets across multiple workspaces.

item.title: Announcing the public preview of custom Text Analytics for health
item.description: Custom Text Analytics for health is the newest healthcare NLP offering from Cognitive Services for Language. It allows you to add a layer of customization on top of Text Analytics for health using state-of-the-art machine learning models to build your own healthcare entity extraction model with your specific domain data. The model's authoring experience can be performed either using the graphical user interface on the Language Studio or programmatically using the REST APIs. The feature is now in public preview allowing you to make 5,000 text records of predictions per language resource for free using the Standard (S) pricing tier.
item.atom:content: Custom Text Analytics for health is the newest healthcare NLP offering from Cognitive Services for Language. It allows you to add a layer of customization on top of Text Analytics for health using state-of-the-art machine learning models to build your own healthcare entity extraction model with your specific domain data. The model's authoring experience can be performed either using the graphical user interface on the Language Studio or programmatically using the REST APIs. The feature is now in public preview allowing you to make 5,000 text records of predictions per language resource for free using the Standard (S) pricing tier.

item.title: Public Preview: Azure NetApp Files Standard Network Features - Edit Volumes
item.description: Azure NetApp Files now supports ability to edit existing ANF volumes and upgrading Basic network features to Standard network features.
item.atom:content: Azure NetApp Files now supports ability to edit existing ANF volumes and upgrading Basic network features to Standard network features.

item.title: Public preview: Rolling Upgrades with MaxSurge for Virtual Machine Scale Sets
item.description: Rolling Upgrades with MaxSurge provides you a new way of upgrading VM instances in a Virtual Machine Scale Set to the latest scale set model.
item.atom:content: Rolling Upgrades with MaxSurge provides you a new way of upgrading VM instances in a Virtual Machine Scale Set to the latest scale set model.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Site Recovery update rollup 67 - May 2023
item.description: This article describes the improvements for the latest version of Azure Site Recovery components.
item.atom:content: This article describes the improvements for the latest version of Azure Site Recovery components.

item.title: General availability: Azure Data Explorer adds new geospatial capabilities
item.description: Azure Data Explorer now supports geospatial analysis with three new functions: geo_point_buffer, geo_line_buffer, and geo_polygon_buffer. These functions let you create polygonal buffers around points, lines, or polygons.
item.atom:content: Azure Data Explorer now supports geospatial analysis with three new functions: geo_point_buffer, geo_line_buffer, and geo_polygon_buffer. These functions let you create polygonal buffers around points, lines, or polygons.

item.title: General Availability: Routing Intent and Virtual WAN Integrated Firewall NVAs
item.description: Routing intent supports inter-region/inter-hub traffic inspection and branch-to-branch traffic inspection for Azure Virtual WAN.
item.atom:content: Routing intent supports inter-region/inter-hub traffic inspection and branch-to-branch traffic inspection for Azure Virtual WAN.

item.title: Azure Backup Reports now includes support for more workloads
item.description: Azure Backup Reports now includes support for more workloads: Azure Database for PostgreSQL Servers, Azure Blobs and Azure Disks.
item.atom:content: Azure Backup Reports now includes support for more workloads: Azure Database for PostgreSQL Servers, Azure Blobs and Azure Disks.

item.title: Public preview: Optimize your workloads for reliability using new workbook template in Azure Advisor

item.atom:content: Evaluate the reliability posture of your workloads, assess risks and plan improvements using the new Reliability workbook template which is now available in Azure Advisor.

item.title: General availability: Seamlessly upgrade your Application Gateway V2 WAF configuration to a policy
item.description: Azure’s regional Web Application Firewall (WAF) on Application Gateway now supports a fully automated experience when upgrading your WAF from configuration to policy.
item.atom:content: Azure’s regional Web Application Firewall (WAF) on Application Gateway now supports a fully automated experience when upgrading your WAF from configuration to policy.

item.atom:content: App Service supports custom error pages in public preview

item.atom:content: API keys for querying data from Azure Monitor application insights will be retired on 31 March 2026

item.atom:content: Azure Payment HSM Service now supports two host IP network interfaces

item.atom:content: Azure Container Storage is a new Azure service built natively for containers that enables customers to create and manage volumes for running production scale stateful container applications.

item.title: Generally available: Policy analytics for Azure Firewall
item.description: Policy analytics for Azure Firewall, now in general availability, provides enhanced visibility into traffic flowing through Azure Firewall, enabling the optimization of your firewall configuration without impacting your application performance.
item.atom:content: Policy analytics for Azure Firewall, now in general availability, provides enhanced visibility into traffic flowing through Azure Firewall, enabling the optimization of your firewall configuration without impacting your application performance.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Center for SAP solutions
item.description: Azure Center for SAP solutions brings together an integrated set of capabilities for deploying and managing SAP landscapes by making Azure SAP aware. You can take advantage of the management capabilities for both new and your existing Azure-based SAP systems.
item.atom:content: Azure Center for SAP solutions brings together an integrated set of capabilities for deploying and managing SAP landscapes by making Azure SAP aware. You can take advantage of the management capabilities for both new and your existing Azure-based SAP systems.

item.title: We're retiring Speech-to-text REST preview API v3.1-preview.1 on May 12, 2023

item.atom:content: We recently made the Speech-to-text REST API version 3.1 generally available. With this release, we'll retire the preview version v3.1-preview.1 on May 12, 2023.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Automation supports Python 3.8 runbooks
item.description: Azure Automation support for Python 3.8 runbooks is now Generally Available.
item.atom:content: Azure Automation support for Python 3.8 runbooks is now Generally Available.

item.title: Alert processing rules fields update
item.description: Alert processing rules are a set of rules that allow for modifications to be made to fired alerts, distinct from alert rules which generate new alerts. With alert processing rules, you can add or remove action groups from your fired alerts.
item.atom:content: Alert processing rules are a set of rules that allow for modifications to be made to fired alerts, distinct from alert rules which generate new alerts. With alert processing rules, you can add or remove action groups from your fired alerts.

item.title: General Availability: AzAcSnap 8 — Azure Application Consistent Snapshot tool updates
item.description: AzAcSnap Version 8 Release
item.atom:content: AzAcSnap Version 8 Release

item.title: Generally available: Azure Bastion now support shareable links
item.description: Shareable links allows users to connect to target resources via Azure Bastion without access to the Azure portal.
item.atom:content: Shareable links allows users to connect to target resources via Azure Bastion without access to the Azure portal.

item.title: Azure VMware Solution now available in Qatar with AV36P
item.description: We are excited to announce that the Azure VMware Solution has gone live in Qatar Central and is now available to customers.
item.atom:content: We are excited to announce that the Azure VMware Solution has gone live in Qatar Central and is now available to customers.

item.atom:content: Monitor the database availability for Azure Database for PostgreSQL – Flexible Server via database-is-alive metric.

item.description: You can now have separate containers that run before application containers are started in a replica and can perform all of the initialization logic.
item.atom:content: You can now have separate containers that run before application containers are started in a replica and can perform all of the initialization logic.

item.title: Public Preview: Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) in Azure Container Apps
item.description: You can now enable CORS for your Azure Container App through the portal or CLI.
item.atom:content: You can now enable CORS for your Azure Container App through the portal or CLI.

item.title: Public Preview – Azure Cache for Redis now supports aAAD based authentication and authorization
item.description: Preview password-free authentication with integrated Azure Active Directory (AAD) complemented with role-based access control supported by open source Redis.
item.atom:content: Preview password-free authentication with integrated Azure Active Directory (AAD) complemented with role-based access control supported by open source Redis.

item.title: GA: Azure Pipelines task to build and deploy to Azure Container Apps

item.atom:content: Use an Azure Pipelines task to build and deploy to Azure Container Apps.

item.title: General Availability: Azure Database for MySQL - Flexible Server major version upgrade
item.description: Upgrade your Azure Database for MySQL flexible server version from 5.7 to 8.0.
item.atom:content: Upgrade your Azure Database for MySQL flexible server version from 5.7 to 8.0.

item.title: Public preview: 99th percentile latency metric in Azure Cache for Redis
item.description: Debug server-side latency with a new Azure Cache for Redis metric
item.atom:content: Debug server-side latency with a new Azure Cache for Redis metric

item.title: Public Preview: Troubleshooting guides for Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server
item.description: Save time by analyzing and troubleshooting common performance issues with troubleshooting guides.
item.atom:content: Save time by analyzing and troubleshooting common performance issues with troubleshooting guides.

item.title: GA: GitHub action to build and deploy to Azure Container Apps
item.description: Use a GitHub action to build and deploy to Azure Container Apps.
item.atom:content: Use a GitHub action to build and deploy to Azure Container Apps.

item.title: Azure Advisor data in Azure Resource Graph is now available in Azure China and US Government clouds
item.description: Advisor recommendations are now available in Azure Resource Graph in Azure China and US Government clouds.
item.atom:content: Advisor recommendations are now available in Azure Resource Graph in Azure China and US Government clouds.

item.title: Azure SQL—General availability updates for mid-May 2023
item.description: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-May 2023
item.atom:content: General availability enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-May 2023

item.title: Azure SQL—Public preview updates for early-May 2023
item.description: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-May 2023
item.atom:content: Public preview enhancements and updates released for Azure SQL in mid-May 2023

item.title: Public Preview: Azure Monitor OpenTelemetry Distro for ASP.NET Core, JavaScript (Node.js), Python
item.description: Onboard to Azure Monitor Application Insights using standard, cloud-native APIs and SDKs with rich data collection capabilities and a first-class Azure experience.
item.atom:content: Onboard to Azure Monitor Application Insights using standard, cloud-native APIs and SDKs with rich data collection capabilities and a first-class Azure experience.

item.title: Generally available: Azure Monitor Agent supports Linux Hardening for CIS and SELinux
item.description: Linux Azure Monitor Agent is now officially supported and tested on CIS and SELinux Operating Systems and Distros. Monitor will continue to test and support these hardening standards for AMA.
item.atom:content: Linux Azure Monitor Agent is now officially supported and tested on CIS and SELinux Operating Systems and Distros. Monitor will continue to test and support these hardening standards for AMA.
